sentences.sContent: Although sentenced to life, he will become eligible for parole after serving 10 years.
sentences.sCn: 尽管被判无期，服刑10年后他将有资格获得假释。

synos.tran: 语言；誓言，诺言；释放宣言

trans.tranCn: 语言；誓言，诺言；释放宣言
trans.tranOther: If a prisoner is given parole, he or she is released before the official end of their prison sentence and has to promise to behave well

trans.tranCn: 有条件释放，假释；使假释出狱；宣誓后释放
trans.tranOther: to allow someone to leave prison on the condition that they promise to behave well
